title: HabitFlow
description: HabitFlow is a productivity app designed to enhance daily routines and help users stay consistent with their goals. It offers engaging challenges and encourages social interaction, making habit-building more dynamic and motivating.

title: Travel Memories
description: A playful digital postbox where users can create envelopes to store and revisit their travel memories. Add trip details, tags, and manage entriesâ€”all in one creative space.

title: Automatic Back Up
description: A Python desktop application that offers a user-friendly interface for selecting multiple source folders and a backup destination, performing timestamped local backups with change detection, optional Google Drive uploads, and real-time status updates with last backup logs.
